alert.note: Alert for Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 10:52AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinellas County through 1130 AM EDT... At 1051 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of St. Pete Beach, or 7 miles west of Fort Desoto Park, moving north northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clearwater, Largo, Pinellas Park, Seminole, Downtown Saint Petersburg, Saint Petersburg, St. Petersburg, St. Pete Beach, Bay Pines, South Highpoint, Tierra Verde, Harbor Bluffs, Gandy, Feather Sound, West And East Lealman, Ridgecrest, Gulfport, Treasure Island, Kenneth City and South Pasadena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
